mapper.update: CREATE TABLE carmessage ( id int(100) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, carName varchar(100) NOT NULL, carType varchar(100) NOT NULL, price varchar(100) NOT NULL, carSeries varchar(100) NOT NULL, stock INT(100) DEFAULT 0 null COMMENT '库存数量', PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE car_customer (id int auto_increment NOT NULL, carSeries varchar(100) NOT NULL, carName varchar(100) NOT NULL, addCarTime varchar(100) NOT null COMMENT '入库时间', buyCarTime varchar(100) null COMMENT '购车时间', customer varchar(100) null COMMENT '顾客姓名', sold varchar(100) DEFAULT 0 NULL COMMENT '0：未售出；1：已售出', CONSTRAINT car_customer_pk PRIMARY KEY (id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
